mapper.select: SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.lecture_no, lc.account_id, lc.subject_no, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.textbook_isbn, lc.lecture_startdate, lc.lecture_enddate, lc.lecture_total, lc.classroom_no, lc.lecture_createdate, lc.lecture_updatedate, sj.subject_no, sj.subject_name, sj.subject_createdate, sj.subject_updatedate, sj.subject_totalday, sj.subject_info FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no LEFT JOIN subject sj ON lc.subject_no = sj.subject_no WHERE lc.lecture_no=#{lectureNo} ORDER BY lc.lecture_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.lecture_total FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no WHERE cr.account_id=#{accountId} ORDER BY class_registration_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM class_registration WHERE account_id=#{accountId}

SELECT cr.class_registration_no, cr.lecture_no, cr.account_id, cr.class_registration_state, cr.class_registration_point, cr.class_registration_review, cr.class_registration_createdate, lc.lecture_no, lc.account_id, lc.subject_no, lc.teacher_name, lc.lecture_name, lc.textbook_isbn, lc.lecture_startdate, lc.lecture_enddate, lc.lecture_total, lc.classroom_no, lc.lecture_createdate, lc.lecture_updatedate, sj.subject_no, sj.subject_name, sj.subject_createdate, sj.subject_updatedate, sj.subject_totalday, sj.subject_info FROM class_registration cr LEFT JOIN lecture lc ON cr.lecture_no = lc.lecture_no LEFT JOIN subject sj ON lc.subject_no = sj.subject_no ORDER BY cr.lecture_no LIMIT #{beginRow}, #{rowPerPage}

SELECT l.lecture_no, l.account_id, s.subject_name, l.teacher_name, l.lecture_name, l.lecture_startdate, l.lecture_enddate FROM lecture l JOIN subject s ON l.subject_no = s.subject_no WHERE lecture_no=#{lectureNo}
